I like this game, it is even better when playing with friends. It may seem hard in the beginning but stick to it and it gets better.
It's fun and thrilling, it will get your blood pumping, really say to get it. Even more fun with friends

Bom jogo, divertido quando em grupo de amigos, tem assasinos bem legais e monstros claassicos, mas o jogo sofre de bugs porém é atualizado constantemente (as vezes até demais),  rs

Meiner Meinung nach ist dieses spiel für ab und zu ganz in Ordnung aber es macht keinen Spaß, denn man hat entweder scheiß random leute oder man hat Killer die cheaten. Außerdem ist das Matchmaking absolut der übelste dreck, denn z.B bin ich auf Bronze 1 und bekommen einen Killer der Chillernd 1 ist. Ich hoffe mal das ein Team-Mitglied der Entwickler das hier liest und hoffentlich ändert sich das spiel zum Guten.
Купи игру, после купи всех персов, ну или соси и проебывай

데드하드는 달리는 도로 위 이차방정식을 이기지 못한다.
Buen juego para jugar tanto solo como con amigos, es divertido aunque a veces resulta un poco agobiante jugarlo por el hecho de ser un juego de terror. Lo recomiendo.

I'm totally hooked by this game. In my opinion there is now a proper matchmaking and i get matched with noobs like I am right now. I had no bugs at all in this time. The graphics are really good and with some adjustment you can play this game with 120 fps or 144 fps. In my opinion the balancing is good and the skill scelieng is very high. You only become very good by playing on your own. Guides give you a comfort start but will not fill the gap for doing really good in the game. The tutorials are also very good for beginners and are well desinged. For guides i recommend the streamer otzvarda.
Olm epic games bedava verince hemen iade ettim olm böyle şans seveyim

Игра неплохая, очень интересный геймплей как за выживших так и за убийц, но есть проблемы с балансом и очень долгие обновления! Вроде обновление на 1.5 гигабайта но на диск заходит больше 50 гигов.
На счёт баланса кажется сурвы намного сильнее маньяка, может конечно я не самый лучший игрок, но на 1 ранге просто нереально дать -4 на других манах кроме рин, хотя даже на рин приходится брать красные аддоны.
Сурвы в плане игры намного приятней! Также при игре встречал очень много токсичных игроков, но это уже не относится к самой игре. Кстати подбор игр очень странный недавно зашёл в игру у меня 20 ранг, но против меня забросило 3 первых ранга.

very fun with friends
take turns as killers against each other, or launch a four man run into a lobby against a random killer

Survivor repair generates very fast. minute per machine. The killer hit Survivor down take time about 1-2 minutes (not pro player but vs pro play T_T), survivor have per "Dead Hard", . After the Survivor has fallen and must be hung, the first hang may be interrupted by a flashlight, a pallet, a broken hook. After Survivor was rescued from the gang maybe have perk "Borrowed Time". The killer will chase Survivor again, it takes a long time, the second hang is also interrupted by a flashlight, a pallet, a broken hook, "Decisive Strike". Some games have player level differences such as killer level 6 but Survivor level 2 x 4 person, This is problem how to balance between low and high level player?
如果你是自己一个人玩儿这个游戏就算了吧，想玩儿屠夫的直接弃坑吧，想单排玩儿人的也别来，只有车队能活下去这个游戏，零平衡制作组根本不关心个人玩家的感受

This game makes me want to punch myself in the nutsack. 1/10
人屠平衡，排位机制，烂透了。如果有入坑新玩家，听劝别玩屠夫，没法玩真的，玩人也请你珍惜屠夫玩家，不要嘲讽，因为现在游戏环境真的已经够无语了，玩屠夫的说是真爱了。最后说一句，这游戏e宝免费了，我是傻逼。

Muito bom e viciante. O melhor a se aproveitar do jogo é o for fun, não fique ligando se vc morre ou escapa, isso não é nem  2% do jogo, apenas se divirta, aprenda a correr do killer, e por mais que no início vc pensa que é um jogo totalmente injusto para o killer, não é, é mais difícil ser killer do que survive
基本没有游戏体验的，玩鬼把把遇到车队，互相扛刀最多杀两个，玩人队友管都不管你，溜了半天鬼，队友一个机子不修，大部分角色还要充值购买，游戏环境极差
